short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Open and visually explore Google Sheets spreadsheets directly in Rowboat.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Rowboat is a tool for making sense of tabular data — the kind found in your Google Sheets spreadsheets.

How to Use:
After opening a spreadsheet in Google Sheets, click on the Open in Rowboat extension icon. A new Rowboat tab with your spreadsheet will be opened automatically!

Rowboat Features:

Free to Use: 
Explore as many spreadsheets as you want for as long as you want!

Lightning Fast:
Open and parse one million rows of data in one second.

Secure in Your Browser:
When you open a file in Rowboat, it stays local in your browser until you choose to share it. See our privacy policy at rowboat.xyz/privacy to learn more.

Beautiful Charts:
Get an instant visual breakdown of your file without having to navigate away from the data itself.

10+ Chart Types:
Whether all you need is a straightforward bar chart or you’re looking for an expansive world map, Rowboat has you covered.

Visualization First:
Visualization as the first step of understanding your data, not just the final product.

Anyone Can Use:
As long as you have a spreadsheet, you can use Rowboat! No code or preprocessing required.

Aesthetic Themes:
Dark mode? Light mode? Submarine mode? Take your pick!

Rowboat+:
Upgrade to Rowboat+ to export presentation-ready PDF or PNG files, download your modified data as a CSV, and save and share the files you create with other Rowboat users to a secure cloud-based library.

Have questions? Visit us at rowboat.xyz!

Open in Rowboat extension currently only supports opening files from Google Sheets.
